siteOrigin.title: Project Technical Highlights
siteOrigin.subtitle: Modern Full-Stack Tech · Engineering Practices · Performance Optimization
siteOrigin.quote:
This project showcases complete modern full-stack development capabilities.

From frontend React 19, Next.js 15, TypeScript, to backend Go microservices, GORM, JWT authentication, to DevOps Docker containerization, Nginx deployment, every aspect demonstrates deep technical understanding and engineering practices.

The project not only implements features but focuses on code quality, performance optimization, security protection - a complete solution ready for production.

techStack.note: From Web3 to AI, from backend to frontend, constantly exploring the boundaries of technology. Practice-oriented, believing that code is the best proof.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you're interested in my technical capabilities, feel free to reach out:

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: I'm a full-stack developer with a deep passion for blockchain technology and decentralized applications. From diving deep into Web3 after graduation to becoming a DeFi quantitative trading system developer, I've always maintained curiosity and enthusiasm for new technologies. In the AI era, I believe the boundaries of technology are being broken, and the real value lies in what we can create.

transformation.title: AI Era Transformation
transformation.description: Using AI-assisted programming frequently in daily development, I've deeply felt how AI technology is redefining the software development industry. AI has broken the traditional monopoly on technical knowledge and lowered the barriers to cross-domain learning. After extensive technical exploration, I've decided to focus my learning on frontend development, laying a solid foundation for full-stack development.
transformation.highlight2: Deeply integrated AI-assisted development for efficiency

defi.title: DeFi Quantitative System Development
defi.description: With solid Rust fundamentals and deep understanding of blockchain, I successfully joined a technical team focused on DeFi quantitative trading, participating in the development of multiple high-frequency trading systems.

project1.name: Solana Arbitrage Bot
project1.description: Developed data monitoring service using Rust, listening to Solana blockchain pool data via gRPC protocol to provide real-time data support for arbitrage strategies.

project2.name: Telegram Trading Bot
project2.description: Developed sniping and copy trading bot, implementing automated trading strategy execution.

exploration.title: Exploration Phase
exploration.description: After graduation, I chose to deeply research blockchain, Web3, and cryptocurrency, learning Rust programming, and practicing my understanding of this emerging technology through digital currency trading. Although I experienced the setback of contract liquidation, it didn't weaken my belief in blockchain technology.
exploration.highlight2: Deep dive into blockchain technology and Web3 ecosystem

purpose.title: Project Purpose
purpose.description: The initial purpose of creating this knowledge base was to record my thoughts and learning journey, building my own knowledge system. In an era of information explosion, I believe systematic knowledge organization and deep thinking are more valuable than fragmented information acquisition. This is both my digital brain and a platform for exchanging ideas with like-minded people.

points.title: Systematization of Knowledge
points.description: Not just fragmented information collection, but building a complete knowledge system and thinking framework

points.title: Theory Meets Practice
points.description: Every concept is verified through practice, every line of code carries thinking

points.title: Continuous Learning & Evolution
points.description: Maintaining learning in a rapidly changing tech world, constantly iterating cognition

points.title: Open Sharing
points.description: Believing the value of knowledge lies in flow and sharing, not monopoly and closure
